## Develop R Packages

We develop tools for the community to help streamline analyses and improve code readability and reproducibility. <a href="./package.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**See more...**</a>
:::

::: columns

## Compile community news

With your help, we compile community news on upcoming conferences, workshops, and vacancies. We also provide a register of research labs around the world. <a href="./directory.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**See more...**</a>
:::

::: {.column width="10%"}
<!-- empty column to create gap -->
:::

::: {.column width="45%"}
## Track funding opportunities

We help track funding opportunities for palaeobiological research with an online community database. <a href="./funding.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**See more...**</a>
:::
:::

<br>

::: columns
::: {.column width="70%"}
## Build community spaces

We build informal community spaces for palaeobiologists to share ideas and resources, advertise opportunities, and network with colleagues. <a href="./community.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**See more...**</a>

# Get involved

We welcome both code and non-code contributions to Palaeoverse. You can contribute in the following ways:

-   Contribute to functionality available in our <a id="contribute" href="https://github.com/palaeoverse-community" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**R Packages**</a>
-   Become a <a href="./form/reviewer.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**Palaeoverse Reviewer**</a> - review code, documentation, and resources
-   Contribute to our community databases such as the <a href="./directory.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**Palaeoverse Directory**</a> and <a href="./funding.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**GrantTrack**</a>
-   Be active in Palaeoverse community spaces such as the <a href="./community.qmd" style="text-decoration: none" target="_blank">**Google Group**</a>
